title: Treatment of oilfield wastewater and synthesis of Na2FeO3 in a chloride ion anode oxidation system
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,614-619
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00762F, Paper
Haoda Guo, Yifei Wang, Naidong Zhang
This study investigates the degradation of oil recovery wastewater and generation of Na2FeO3 in an anodic oxidation system.
